Commands.RecocnitionText: RTB;Go To Return To Base;Go To RTB
Request Rearming;Request Refueling;Request Rearming and Refueling
Ground Electric Power On;Turn on the ground power;Turn on ground power
Ground Electric Power Off;Turn off the ground power;Turn off ground power
Wheel chocks place;Place the wheel chocks;Request To place the wheel chocks
Wheel chocks remove;Remove the wheel chocks;Request To remove the wheel chocks
Ground Air Supply Connect;Connect ground air supply;Request to connect ground air supply
Ground Air Supply Disconnect;Disconnect ground air supply;Request to disconnect ground air supply
Ground Air Supply Apply;Apply ground air supply;Apply to disconnect ground air supply
RTB;Go To Return To Base;Go To RTB
